description: Least positive unitary linear combination of distinct numbers in row n of Pascal's triangle; i.e. least positive sum of form d(0)C(n-1,0) + d(1)C(n-1,1) + ...+ d(m)C(n-1,m), d(i)=+-1, m = [ (n+1)/2 ].
prog: (PARI) padbin(n, len) = my(b = binary(n)); while(length(b) < len, b = concat(0, b);); b;a(n) = m = (n+1)\2; nb = 2^(m+1); lps = 0; v = vector(m, i, binomial(n-1, i-1)); for (i = 1, nb-1, vb = padbin(i, m+1); s = sum(k = 1, m, if (vb[k], v[k], -v[k])); if ((s>0), if (lps == 0, lps = s, if (s < lps, lps = s;);));); lps; \\ _Michel Marcus_, Sep 30 2013
